label: AB2C3D2_tP16_90_c_f_ce_e-001
title: $G7_{5}$ (PbCO$_{3}\cdot$PbCl$_{2}$, Phosgenite) ({\em Obsolete}) Structure
comments: (Onotaro, 1934) made an early determination of the structure of phosgenite, and (Gottfried, 1937) assigned it the {\em Strukturbericht} designation $G7_{5}$. However, the ``proposed structure [was] based on photographic data and partly on steric considerations'' (Giuseppetti, 1974). Subsequent investigations showed that the true phosgenite structure \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2C3D2_tP32_127_g_eh_gk_k-001}{was in space group $P4/mbm$ \#127}.  We list the original structure here as part of the historical record.
